name: AFC Urgent Care - North Andover
description: If interested in a screening and to be eligible for an AFC Urgent Care doctors note in order to be tested for the novel coronavirus (COVID-19) on Friday, March 27th in North Andover or Saturday, March 28th in Stoneham, please call us between 8am and 8pm on Wednesday, March 25th or Thursday, March 26th at 781-430-8161.

name: AFC Urgent Care - Stoneham
description: If interested in a screening and to be eligible for an AFC Urgent Care doctors note in order to be tested for the novel coronavirus (COVID-19) on Friday, March 27th in North Andover or Saturday, March 28th in Stoneham, please call us between 8am and 8pm on Wednesday, March 25th or Thursday, March 26th at 781-430-8161.

name: CVS Pharmacy
description: A CVS Pharmacy in Shrewsbury opened a pilot testing site for coronavirus on Thursday designated for first responders and health care workers.

name: Cambridge Health Alliance - Somerville Hospital
description: COVID-19 testing would be available to existing system patients via a stand-alone testing center at its Somerville Hospital location. Due to continued limited availability of tests, patients must meet federal criteria and be existing CHA primary care patients to be eligible for testing at this location.

name: Cape Cod Healthcare
description: As of March 20, 2020, a physician must have affiliated status with Cape Cod Healthcare to submit a patient’s order for drive-through testing. Individuals without a primary care physician who are experiencing symptoms, including fever, coughing or shortness of breath, should call 508-862-5595 and they will be screened for COVID-19 testing with a Cape Cod Healthcare clinical provider via phone. If testing is required, the clinical provider will follow the same process of submitting the doctor’s order to the testing team and the patient will be called with a testing appointment time.

name: Cape Cod Hospital
description: If you are experiencing SERIOUS symptoms and do not have primary care provider, please visit the triage tents located outside of Cape Cod Hospital and Falmouth Hospital for screening.

name: Falmouth Hospital
description: If you are experiencing SERIOUS symptoms and do not have primary care provider, please visit the triage tents located outside of Cape Cod Hospital and Falmouth Hospital for screening.
